document_data.mainbody:
Alandamers Gate was the northern gate of the city of Athkatla in Amn.
Alandamers Gate stood on the border of two districts of Athkatla the Wave District to the west and the Temple District to the east. The road that passed Alandamers Gate ran north towards the grand temple complex of the Goldspires and the monastery Arbalests House.
All non-citizens who passed Alandamers Gate had to pay an "any one coin" toll, of gold or silver, to be allowed into Athkatla.
